mapper.sql: /* bookCommon 쿼리 */ select isbn, b_title, b_author, b_painter, b_translator ,b_pupdate , b_update , b_editdate , b_size , b_pagesize ,b_abprice , b_stock, b_totscore, cat_no , pub_name from booking_book_data
mapper.select: /* BookDetail 조회 */ select isbn, b_title, b_author, b_painter, b_translator ,to_char(b_pubdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_pubdate , b_update , to_char(b_editdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_editdate , b_size , b_pagesize ,b_abprice , b_stock, b_totscore, cat_no , pub_name from booking_book_data where isbn = '978-89-381-1028-2'

choose.when: b_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or b_author like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or pub_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: select count(isbn) as searchTotal from booking_book_data
select count(st_no) as searchTotal from booking_book_stock
select count(rel_no) as searchTotal from booking_book_release

select isbn, b_title, b_author, to_char(b_pubdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_pubdate , b_abprice, b_stock, cat_no, pub_name, b_update, b_editdate , series_name, series_no, series_no_sub , b_index, b_comment, b_complain from booking_book_data where isbn like #{isbn}
mapper.insert:
select booking_book_stock_seq.nextval from dual
insert into booking_book_stock (st_no, isbn, st_name, st_name_no, st_amount) values(#{st_no}, #{isbn}, #{st_name}, ${st_name_no}, #{st_amount})

select booking_book_release_seq.nextval from dual
insert into booking_book_release (rel_no, isbn, rel_name, rel_name_no, rel_amount) values(#{rel_no}, #{isbn}, #{rel_name}, #{rel_name_no}, #{rel_amount})

insert into booking_book_data (isbn, b_title, b_author, pub_name, cat_no, b_pubdate, b_abprice , b_index, b_comment, b_complain , series_name, series_no, series_no_sub) values(#{isbn}, #{b_title}, #{b_author}, #{pub_name}, #{cat_no}, #{b_pubdate}, #{b_abprice} , #{b_index}, #{b_comment}, #{b_complain} , #{series_name}, #{series_no}, #{series_no_sub})
